citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Traveling itinerary was submitted in January, including Penn Valley Rodeo on May 19-20, 2023. A Veterinary Medical
Officer attempted to inspect the licensee on 19 May in accordance with the submitted itinerary, but the licensee was not at
the Penn Valley Rodeo. Licensee was called at 6:30 PM, and a call back was not received by 7:00 PM.
Itineraries shall contain complete and accurate information concerning the whereabouts of any animal intended for
exhibition at any location other than the person's approved site, and therefore must be updated if plans change in order to
facilitate inspection and comply with the Animal Welfare Act and Regulations.
Correct by 30 May, 2023
End Section

narrative:
2.126(c) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
Traveling itinerary was submitted in January, including Penn Valley Rodeo on May 19-20, 2023.  A Veterinary Medical 
Officer attempted to inspect the licensee on 19 May in accordance with the submitted itinerary, but the licensee was not at 
the Penn Valley Rodeo.  Licensee was called at 6:30 PM, and a call back was not received by 7:00 PM.  
 Itineraries shall contain complete and accurate information concerning the whereabouts of any animal intended for 
exhibition at any location other than the person's approved site, and therefore must be updated if plans change in order to 
facilitate inspection and comply with the Animal Welfare Act and Regulations. 
 
Correct by 30 May, 2023 
 
 
 
End Section
